name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, proficient in **Python**, **REST**, **GraphQL**, **Docker**, and **SQL**. I have a strong foundation in developing robust backend systems using technologies such as **Java**, **C/C++**, and **MySQL**, and I am well-versed in asynchronous programming and caching techniques. My experience includes building high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
In addition to my technical skills, I possess a solid understanding of coding principles and container-orchestration systems, further enhancing system reliability and scalability. I also excel in team collaboration and communication, contributing to seamless project delivery.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop robust backend services, ensuring adherence to coding principles and best practices while enhancing performance and maintainability.
Designed and implemented **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs to provide seamless data access and integration, facilitating asynchronous programming and efficient communication between frontend and backend components.
Worked with **Docker** to create containerized applications, optimizing deployment across various environments and enhancing the scalability of backend services.
Maintained and managed databases with **SQL**, including **MySQL**, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage, while implementing caching strategies to improve application performance.
Participated in the development and deployment of microservices using container-orchestration systems, enhancing application resiliency and achieving higher availability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical specifications, delivering features and solutions on time, using **HTML5** for creating user-friendly interfaces.
Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers, promoting knowledge sharing and adherence to best coding practices while ensuring high-quality code delivery.
Engaged in continuous learning and improvement efforts to stay current with industry trends, evolving languages and tools, including **English** communication skills for effective collaboration with international teams.

• Developed and maintained scalable backend services using **Python** and **REST** APIs, ensuring high performance and reliability for financial platforms.
• Implemented **SQL** database solutions with **MySQL**, optimizing queries to enhance data retrieval and storage efficiency by **30%**.
• Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, facilitating smooth development and deployment processes across multi-environment setups.
• Employed asynchronous programming techniques to improve system responsiveness and throughput, achieving up to **50%** reduction in request latency.
• Applied coding principles to create clean, maintainable, and efficient codebases, resulting in faster onboarding and easier collaboration within development teams.
• Leveraged **HTML5** and **Java** to build secure, dynamic web applications, enhancing user experiences based on stakeholder feedback.
• Integrated caching mechanisms to optimize data access speeds, thereby improving application performance and reducing resource consumption by **40%**.
• Actively utilized container-orchestration systems to manage application scalability effectively and automate deployment processes.
• Communicated effectively in **English** to collaborate with cross-functional teams, providing technical insights and recommendations.

• Developed and optimized backend services using **Python** (Django) and **SQL** (MySQL), ensuring robust data management and adherence to coding principles to support **REST** APIs and **GraphQL** endpoints.
• Utilized **Docker** for containerization of applications, enhancing deployment consistency and environment management across **container-orchestration systems** like Kubernetes.
• Designed efficient caching strategies to improve application performance, applying **Redis** caching for high-traffic workflows, which reduced response times by up to **50%**.
• Engaged in asynchronous programming to manage concurrent processes efficiently, leading to a **30%** improvement in request handling times.
• Created data storage solutions using **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high availability and scalability for dynamic data workloads across **e-commerce** functionalities.
• Integrated third-party payment processing systems, ensuring PCI compliance and secure transaction handling with proven technologies like **Stripe** and **PayPal**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement features using **Java** and **C/C++** when necessary, aligning closely with existing enterprise solutions.
• Wrote and maintained clear, concise documentation of code and workflows in English, facilitating collaboration and knowledge sharing among team members.
• Employed effective debugging and testing techniques to ensure reliability and security, leading to a **40%** reduction in production incidents.
